long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Notary is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension that allows you to easily save important text snippets from any website. It provides a simple way to collect, manage, and review highlights, making your research and note-taking process more efficient and organized.

Key Features:

1. Highlight and Save: Quickly save highlighted text from any website as a card with just one click.
2. Sidebar for Convenience: Access all your saved cards in a handy sidebar, so you can view, manage, and remove cards without leaving the current page.
3. Automatic URL and Title Saving: Notary automatically stores the URL and the title of the page where the text was saved for easy reference and navigation.
4. Card Selection and Removal: Select cards to remove individually, or clear all cards at once with the 'Remove All' button.
5. Organize and Review: Keep your research, quotes, and notes in one place, making it easier to review and organize your findings.

How to Use Notary:

1. Install the Notary extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Highlight text on any website that you wish to save.
3. Click the 'Add to Cards' button that appears near the highlighted text.
4. The saved card will be added to the sidebar, where you can view, manage, and remove cards as needed.
5. Click the 'Remove Card' button to remove a selected card, or use the 'Remove All' button to clear all cards.

Whether you're a student, researcher, or just an avid reader, Notary is the perfect companion for organizing and managing your online research and note-taking. Install Notary today and start saving valuable information with ease!
